results.Title: System Maintenance
results.Message:
In preparation for the summer storm season, BGE will be validating storm-related messaging and services this evening from 7:30 p.m. to 8:30 p.m. 

BGE.com and My Account services will remain available during this time. Thank you.

results.Title: Outage Reporting System
results.Message: We are currently performing maintenance to our outage system and outage map. If you experience a power outage, you can report outages and check status at 1.877.778.2222.

results.Title: Flood
results.Message: BGE is working with state and local emergency personnel in the aftermath of recent damaging flooding. Severe infrastructure damage, especially in the Ellicott City area, impacts our ability to restore power and natural gas service to some customers. If you are experiencing an extended service outage, you can contact BGE at 1.800.685.0123 for information about your account.

results.Title: Energy Savings Day
results.Message: The credits you may have earned during the Energy Savings Day on Friday, July 19 will be available on BGE.com/MyAccount or the BGE app by the evening of Monday, July 22. Credits from the July 17th Energy Savings Day are visible now.

results.Title: Customer Alert
results.Message: IMPORTANT NOTICE: If you received a message from BGE regarding an outage due to emergency repairs today that would start at 10:00 AM and last for approximately four hours, please note that this only applies to customers in the Arnold area of Annapolis and Glen Burnie. This message was sent in error to additional customers who are not impacted by this work. We apologize for this error and are working to ensure this does not occur again.

results.Title: ​The Business office will be closed
results.Message: The Business office will be closed today at 11:15am due to the Columbus day holiday. We will re-open at 7:00am tomorrow morning.

results.Title: Advance MP3
results.Message:
Our outage reporting system will be unavailable between 8 a.m. and 2 p.m. on Sunday, November 11. During this time, you can report your outage online or via mobile app, text message or social media. 

Unfortunately, we will not be able to provide outage status information during this period and the outage map will not update. 

Thank you for your understanding as we complete this maintenance.

results.Title: Storm
results.Message: We understand that a power outage can make this already challenging time even more difficult. When adverse weather affects our service area, BGE is prepared. If you experience a power outage or need to report a downed wire, please call 877.778.2222. BGE crews are following CDC guidance for social distancing and personal protection while working as safely and quickly as possible to restore power. BGE asks all customers, including those with smart meters, to report their outage. Outages may also be reported online and by texting OUT to MYBGE (69243).

results.Title: System May Be Unavailable
results.Message: BGE.com and our mobile app may be temporarily unavailable while we perform maintenance from 8:30 p.m. on Saturday, November 17 through 4 a.m. on Sunday, November 18.  We apologize for any inconvenience during this period.  As always, you can contact BGE at 1.800.685.0123 with any gas or electric emergencies. Thank you.

results.Title: System May Be Unavailable
results.Message: BGE.com and our mobile app may be temporarily unavailable while we perform maintenance from 8:30 p.m. on Saturday, November 17 through 4 a.m. on Sunday, November 18.  We apologize for any inconvenience during this period.  As always, you can contact BGE at 1.800.685.0123 with any gas or electric emergencies. Thank you.

results.Title: Maintenance
results.Message: Upcoming Maintenance: To deliver a better customer experience, a system upgrade will take place starting at 8 p.m. on March 1st. MyAccount on BGE.com will not be available from 8 p.m. on March 1st to 6 a.m. on March 2nd. We apologize for any inconvenience it may cause.

results.Title: Customer Usage Data is Currently Unavailable
results.Message: Customers are currently unable to view usage details on BGE.com. Our technical team has been notified and working to resolve the issue as quickly as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience.

results.Title: MP3
results.Message: Upcoming Maintenance: My Account services will be unavailable from  8 p.m. Thursday, January 24 to 2 a.m. Friday, January 25 due to system upgrades. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause. Thank you for your patience.

results.Title: BGE Mobilized for Winter Storm Petra
results.Message: When adverse weather affects our service area, BGE is prepared. If you experience a power outage or need to report a downed wire, please call 877.778.2222. BGE asks all customers, including those with smart meters, to report their outage. Outages may also be reported through the app or by texting OUT to MYBGE (69243). BGE crews work as safely and quickly as possible to restore power.

results.Message: When adverse weather affects our service area, BGE is prepared. If you experience a power outage or need to report a downed wire, please call 877.778.2222. results.Title: Payments Unavailable
results.Message: ​We are currently experiencing technical issues with processing online payments. We apologize for the inconvenience.​ Please check back later or use our external payment tool (https://ipn2.paymentus.com/rotp/bge) to make a one-time payment. Thank you for your patience.

results.Title: Maintenaice
results.Message: MyAccount on ‘BGE’.com will not be available between 8:00 p.m. on Friday, March 29 to 5:30 a.m. on Saturday, March 30 due to system upgrades. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause. Thank you for your patience

results.Title: CASE NO. 9610 - A Prehearing Conference
results.Message: CASE NO. 9610 - A Prehearing Conference has been scheduled for June 27, 2019, beginning at 1:00 p.m., at the Maryland Public Service Commission, Frank O. Heintz Hearing Room, William Donald Schaefer Tower, 16th floor, 6 St. Paul Street, Baltimore, Maryland. The purpose of the hearing is to set a procedural schedule regarding BGE’s application for an increase in electric and gas base rates, consider any petitions to intervene that have been filed, and consider any other preliminary matters requested by the parties.  Petitions to Intervene shall be filed with Commission by June 25, 2019.  Additional information is available.

results.Title: ​The BGE customer service call center is closed
results.Message: The BGE customer service call center is closed for the remainder of today and will resume normal business hours starting at 7 AM tomorrow morning.

results.Title: MyAccount on BGE.com will not be available
results.Message: MyAccount on BGE.com will not be available between 5:00 a.m. on Saturday, June 29 to 12:00 p.m. on Saturday, June 29 due to system upgrades. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause. Thank you for your patience.

results.Title: ​A PeakRewards emergency cycling event is currently taking place.
results.Message:
If you are enrolled in the PeakRewards Air Conditioning program, your air conditioner will be cycled up to your chosen cycling level (50%, 75% or 100%) for the duration of the event. If you are enrolled in the PeakRewards Electric Water Heater program, electricity to your water heater will be off during the event.  You cannot override your participation during an emergency event or during the transition after an emergency event. BGE is unable to predict when the event will end.

If you have a medical or health condition or require assistance, please call the PeakRewards hotline at 888-309-PEAK (7325). For more information, visit BGEsavings.com/PeakRewardsEvent.​

results.Title: SER Savings Data
results.Message: Energy savings data is currently unavailable in the BGE mobile app. Log into your bge.com My Account to view historical information.

results.Title: CASE NO. 9500(n) - NOTICE OF HEARING
results.Message: CASE NO. 9500(n) - NOTICE OF HEARING - The hearing is RESCHEDULED for Monday, April 13, 2020, beginning at 1:00 p.m., concerning BGE’s purchased gas adjustment proceeding which examines changes to natural gas costs for the period November 2018 through October 2019. Hearing topics may include: the Maryland Public Service Commission audit of gas costs BGE incurred during this period; and the price of gas charged by BGE to customers, based upon economic forces in the gas market.  The hearing will be conducted through Google Hangouts for participants and will be live streamed for public viewing through the following link: stream.meet.google.com/stream/9973aa3d-12f6-4c64-bdf4-f8de331e355d (Updated 4/8/2020)

results.Title: COVID-19 Pandemic
results.Message:
We are closely monitoring the COVID-19 pandemic, and we are here to help customers through temporary or extended financial hardship. 

Estamos monitoreando de cerca la pandemia de COVID-19, y estamos aquí para ayudar a los clientes a través de dificultades financieras temporeras o extendidas.

results.Title: CASE NO. 9636
results.Message: CASE NO. 9636 - A Prehearing Conference has been scheduled for April 21, 2020, beginning at 9:00 a.m. The purpose of the conference is to set a procedural schedule regarding BGE’s application for a Certificate of Public Convenience and Necessity for authority to rebuild a portion of an existing 115 kV electric transmission line in northern Harford County, Maryland, consider any petitions to intervene that have been filed, and consider any other preliminary matters.  Petitions to Intervene shall be filed with Commission on or before April 17, 2020.  Update 4/1/2020: The Prehearing Conference will be conducted through Zoom for participants and others may watch a live stream on the Public Utility Law Judge’s You Tube channel available through the following link: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCYK5mu0UMAUOqSQowRq2TIQ/
